name: SwingingAtwood (dysts)
equations: SwingingAtwood system (see dysts package for equations)
description_simple: A mechanical system consisting of two swinging weights connected by ropes and pulleys. This is only chaotic when m2 is sufficiently larger than m1, and there are nonzero initial momenta
description_complex: A chaotic dynamical system imported from the dysts package. This system exhibits complex, sensitive dynamics characteristic of deterministic chaos.
